issue.title: [Rust]: BitMap is_set should return Result rather than relying on inlined assertion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11316](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11316). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The inlined assertion is prone to fail and panic when a user of the method passes anything other than 0..7 range. This is making wrong usages to crash the application that uses Arrow.
